tripleplay.ui

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
      • tripleplay.ui.Widget<T>
        • tripleplay.ui.TextWidget<Label>
          • tripleplay.ui.Label

  • public class Label
extends TextWidget<Label>
    A widget that displays one or more lines of text and/or an icon image.
